org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.util
Class ServiceLocator

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.util.ServiceLocator
Direct Known Subclasses:
OsgiServiceLocator
public class ServiceLocator
extends java.lang.Object

A service locator for use both inside and outside of an Eclipse environment. Provides access to markup languages by name.

Markup languages may be dynamically discovered by adding a Java service file in one of the following locations:

  • META-INF/services/org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.parser.markup.MarkupLanguage
  • services/org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.parser.markup.MarkupLanguage
  • META-INF/services/org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.parser.markup.MarkupLanguageProvider
  • services/org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.parser.markup.MarkupLanguageProvider

Since:
1.0
Author:
David Green
See Also:
MarkupLanguage, MarkupLanguageProvider

getMarkupLanguage

public MarkupLanguage getMarkupLanguage(java.lang.String languageName)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
get a markup language by name

Parameters:
languageName - the name of the markup language, or the fully qualified name of the class that implements the language
Returns:
the language implementation
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the provided language name is null or if no implementation is available for the given language
